Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Nice to meet you, <MYNAME>. Our apologies
for coming so early in the morning.
<PAGE>
My name is <BLUE>Sanjay</BLUE>. It is very nice to
meet you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My master and I are going to be living
in the house you built recently, so we
came to say hello.
<PAGE>
Thank you so much for building such a
wonderful house for us.
<PAGE>
Having heard from Master Dunhill that
you were the one who built it...
<PAGE>
My master wanted to give you his thanks
in person. Allow me to introduce you.
<PAGE>
Master, please come in.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to present the Prince of a
certain kingdom, Master <BLUE>Amir</BLUE>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I've heard about you from
Sanjay.
<PAGE>
I was surprised by the quality of the
house you built for us. Very impressive.
An equal to my homeland.
<PAGE>
I really like this town. I've decided
that we will live here for a while.
<PAGE>
I hope you'll help us out with
information about the town. I'm looking
forward to living here!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>. We are going to be
living in the same town for a while.
We'll see you again soon.

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
